import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react' import { Col, Card, CardHeader, CardBody, Form, FormGroup, FormText, Label, Input, Alert, Button, CardFooter} from 'reactstrap' import axios from 'axios' const Settings = () => { const [account, setAccount] = useState({}) useEffect(async () => { const response = await axios({ url: 'http://localhost:5000/api/account', method: 'GET', headers: { 'Accept': 'application/json', 'Content-type': 'application/json' }, data: { } }) setAccount(response.account) }) return (

Settings
{alertMsg} This is optional
) } export default Settings
